可以使用的command block
(/give DennisChao_ minecraft:command_block
然後....
/setblock ~1 ~ ~ minecraft:command_block

/setblock ~1 ~ ~ minecraft:command_block
/setblock ~1 ~ ~ minecraft:command_block
-------
/give DennisChao_ minecraft:diamond sword
